Indian Economy.title: Why China’s plan to reduce its emissions is significant for climate action
Indian Economy.summary: China’s President Xi Jinping, making an appearance at the event through video-conferencing, finally unveiled his country’s plans to reduce its greenhouse gas emissions, and set a target of 7-10 per cent cuts by the year 2035 from its peak levels

Indian Economy.title: South Korea differs from Trump, says can’t pay $350 billion to US in cash for tariff deal
Indian Economy.summary: The two countries reached a handshake agreement in July to cut US tariffs on South Korean goods to 15 per cent from 25 per cent.

Indian Economy.title: UN reimposes ‘snapback’ sanctions, including arms embargo on Iran
Indian Economy.summary: The sanctions on Iran have been reimposed via a mechanism known as “snapback” which was included in the 2015 nuclear deal signed between Iran and the world powers.

Banking & Finance.title: RBI sets 15-day deadline for settlement of claims on deceased customers’ bank accounts, lockers
Banking & Finance.summary: RBI directs banks to settle deceased customers’ claims within 15 days, standardises process, and mandates compensation for delays in settlement.

Banking & Finance.summary: Banks will next be closed today and tomorrow during the weekend on September 27 and 28 (fourth Saturday and Sunday), according to the RBI rules.

Technology Sector.title: As Trump expands tariff net, why questions loom over the effectiveness of a trade deal with the US
Technology Sector.summary: Trump’s move assumes significance as India is in the middle of negotiations with the US, and the elimination of reciprocal tariffs is a key ask from the Indian side, though sectoral tariffs are not part of the talks.

Technology Sector.title: BSF sends back Pakistani national who accidently crossed over to India
Technology Sector.summary: Mohd Akram, a resident of Pakistan, was taken into custody from the R S Pura sector on the outskirts of Jammu city on September 25 after he inadvertently crossed into Indian territory, the officials said.

Technology Sector.title: Hours after arrest, Wangchuk wife says: ‘We are with India and truth…national machinery unleashed to tarnish his image’
Technology Sector.summary: Climate Activist Sonam Wangchuk was on Friday detained by Ladakh police under the National Security Act (NSA). His wife Gitanjali Angmo speaks on the development.
